StatDef.label: ranged DPS (close)
StatDef.description: The weapon's damage per second at a distance of 3 cells or less. The actual damage per second will also be affected by other factors.

StatDef.label: ranged DPS (short)
StatDef.description: The weapon's damage per second at a distance of 15 cells. The actual damage per second will also be affected by other factors.

StatDef.label: ranged DPS (medium)
StatDef.description: The weapon's damage per second at a distance of 25 cells. The actual damage per second will also be affected by other factors.

StatDef.label: ranged DPS (long)
StatDef.description: The weapon's damage per second at a distance of 40 cells or more. The actual damage per second will also be affected by other factors.
